fields.summary: Data may become not correct if mappers fail during the redistribute step, "distribute by rand()"

fields.summary: PlanUtils: Rand() is not a failure-tolerant distribution column

comments.body:
Any review update? And which case does this patch fixed? We suffer from running repeatedly query with dynamic partition with distributed by rand , result in data count inconsistency. 

Thanks [~gopalv]
